mapper.select: SELECT c.company_name as name, u.user_id, u.email, u.registration_date, c.company_phone_number as phone_number, '구인자' AS user_type FROM client c INNER JOIN user u ON c.client_id = u.user_id

SELECT c.client_id as id, c.company_name as name, c.ceo, c.business_type, u.nickname, u.email, u.registration_date, c.company_description, c.company_reg_no, c.company_website_url, c.company_address, c.company_phone_number, c.company_fax_num FROM user u JOIN client c ON u.user_id = c.client_id WHERE u.user_id = #{clientId}
